sentences.en: A few scandalous whores have been sent to the House of Correction.
sentences.cn: 有几个声名狼藉的妓女被送进了教养院.

sentences.en: a scandalous waste of public money
All this scandalous talk goes upon a mere supposition.
sentences.cn: 所有这些诽谤只不过起于一种推测.

sentences.en: Did you ever hear anything so scandalous?
sentences.cn: 你听说过这么丢人的事 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't talk in that way, it is perfectly scandalous.
sentences.cn: 千万别这么说, 这实在太不象话了.

sentences.en: Her manipulation of her friends scandalous.
sentences.cn: 她利用她的朋友来搬弄是非.

sentences.en: It is absolutely scandalous that a fantastic building like this is just left to rot away.
sentences.cn: 一栋如此气势辉煌的大楼就任其腐朽颓败，令人满腔愤慨。

sentences.en: It is nothing short of scandalous.
It was quite scandalous and the pictures were incredibly frightening.
sentences.cn: 这不是诽谤的,传来的画面是那么令人不能相信地恐怖.

sentences.en: It's scandalous that there is conflict between your brothers.
sentences.cn: 你们兄弟俩打内战,多不像话!

sentences.en: Newspaper columns were full of scandalous tales.
sentences.cn: 报纸专栏充斥着丑闻故事。

sentences.en: S : yes, his marriage to Katie is actually quite scandalous.
sentences.cn: 是啊.他跟凯蒂结婚简直是个笑话.

sentences.en: S: Oh, you do talk scandalous! You do waltz divinely, Captain Butler.
sentences.cn: 斯: 噢, 说出这种话你不觉得可耻吗? 你的华尔兹跳得真好, 巴特勒船长.

sentences.en: The scandalous, seditious and libelous books that need to be brought to justice in this remarkable sentence are suddenly revealed to have a soul.
sentences.cn: 有诽谤性的煽动性的中伤性的需要被审判的书,在这句话里突然被透露出是有灵魂的。

sentences.en: They would be sacked for criminal or scandalous behaviour.
sentences.cn: 若有犯罪或不道德的行为，他们就会被解雇。

sentences.en: Yes, the world of pro sports had a scandalous week.
sentences.cn: 是的, 职业体育世界经历了耻辱性的一周.
